text:
.@PressSec starts today’s WH briefing saying: Law and order must prevail to preserve order in our streets.

Note: Coronavirus is surging. Americans want answers regarding alleged Russian bounties on U.S. military service people. People continue to protest police brutality. https://t.co/wbQw3muelg
